officialTitle: A 6-Week, Randomized, Parallel, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Fixed-Dose, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Lurasidone in Children and Adolescent Subjects With Irritability Associated With Autistic Disorder
summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of 2 fixed doses of lurasidone (20 mg/day and 60 mg/day) for 6 weeks compared with placebo in pediatric and adolescent subjects with irritability associated with autistic disorder who reside in the community setting.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Aberrant Behavior Checklist (ABC) Irritability Subscale Score at Week 6
